section.name: User Guide
section.p: The HttpClient user guide is designed to help developers use HttpClient in their applications. While the concept of a user guide being for developers may seem strange, the term developer is already in use for people helping to develop HttpClient.
If you are new to HttpClient, make sure to work through the Tutorial and have a look at the Sample Code. Before reporting problems, read about Trouble Shooting
